text: Sabrin Sburlea (born 12 May 1989 in Sânnicolau Mare, Timiș County) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a forward for German club TSV Berg. On 29 January 2015, Sburlea signed for German 3. Liga side Hansa Rostock until the end of the season. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;FC Braşov *Liga II: 2007–08 ==References== ==External links== * * * * *Sabrin Sburlea at Fupa Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Romanian footballers Category:Romania international footballers Category:SR Brașov players Category:FC Rapid București players Category:FC Vaslui players Category:FC Hansa Rostock players Category:SSV Jahn Regensburg players Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:3. title: Sabrin Sburlea
